io.elegie.luchess.app.lucene4x.explore

Class GameListQuerySimilarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.Similarity
      • org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.TFIDFSimilarity
        • org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.DefaultSimilarity
          • io.elegie.luchess.app.lucene4x.explore.GameListQuerySimilarity

  • public class GameListQuerySimilarity
extends org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.DefaultSimilarity
    The default similarity, extended so as to provide the payload to the collector. The payload should contain the continuation, set during the indexing.
    See Also:
    MoveTextTokenizer

    • Method Detail

      • scorePayload

        public float scorePayload(int doc,
                 int start,
                 int end,
                 org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef payload)

        We pass the payload to the collector in this method.

        Note 1: this method may be called many times with different documents, so the collector will need to retain the right payload, matching with the docID passed to its GameListQueryCollector.collect(int docID).

        Note 2: the BytesRef object passed as parameter is actually reused by Lucene under the hood, so we need to deep-clone it, in order to provide the collector with an immutable value.

        Overrides:
        scorePayload in class org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.DefaultSimilarity
